CustomField.formula: ( SegmentRiskFormula__c ) * ( CASE(DescriptionIsClear__c, "Yes", 1, "No", 5, "In Parts", 2, 0) + CASE(ActivityRestricted__c, "Yes", 5, "No", 1, "In Parts", 2, 0) + CASE(Reputation__c, "Yes", 1, "No", 5, "In Parts", 2, 0) + CASE(QualityProduct__c, "Yes", 1, "No", 5, "In Parts", 2, 0) + CASE(PresenceMarket__c, "Yes", 1, "No", 5, "In Parts", 2, 0) + CASE(RealisticForecast__c, "Yes", 1, "No", 5, "In Parts", 2, 0) )
CustomField.label: Score
